custom-sql.sql: SELECT ID_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION where PROC_INST_ID_ in [$INSTANCE_IDS$]
SELECT ID_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION where SUPER_EXEC_ in [$EXEC_IDS$] or PARENT_ID_ in [$EXEC_IDS$]
SELECT distinct NAME_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK where EXECUTION_ID_ in [$EXEC_IDS$]
SELECT distinct t.ASSIGNEE_, l.GROUP_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK t left outer join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK l on (l.TASK_ID_ = t.ID_ and l.TYPE_ = 'candidate') where t.EXECUTION_ID_ in [$EXEC_IDS$]

SELECT e.ID_, e.PROC_INST_ID_, e.SUPER_EXEC_, e.PARENT_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK t left outer join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK l on (l.TASK_ID_ = t.ID_ and l.TYPE_ = 'candidate') inner join ACT_RU_EXECUTION e on (t.EXECUTION_ID_ = e.ID_) where (1=1)
SELECT e.ID_, e.PROC_INST_ID_, e.SUPER_EXEC_, e.PARENT_ID_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK t inner join ACT_RU_EXECUTION e on (t.EXECUTION_ID_ = e.ID_) where (t.ID_ = ?)
SELECT ID_, PROC_INST_ID_, SUPER_EXEC_ FROM ACT_RU_EXECUTION where ID_ in [$EXEC_IDS$]
SELECT ID_ FROM ACT_HI_ACTINST where (ACT_NAME_ = ?) and (EXECUTION_ID_ in [$EXEC_IDS$])
